p.k: After a summer break, it's time for the Mercedes-Benz Virtual GP 2018 to return and of course, why not in a spectacular way? Let's say - a night race at Sakhir, Bahrain? And don't forget this is the third out of four races using the Mercedes-Benz C9 prototypes from 1989. A fantastic challenge, and what a fabulous race it was! As always, Justin Sutton (FakeGhostPirate) and Chris Buxton (KingKodiak) are going to walk you through it.
